summary: Enterprise customer reporting seat count discrepancy on invoice
suggested_reply: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Mr. Chen. I've reviewed your contract ENT-2023-789 and confirmed that your agreement specifies 45 seats. I'm issuing a credit for the 5 additional seats ($500 total) that will be applied to your February invoice. I've also updated your account to ensure correct seat count going forward. You'll receive a corrected invoice and credit memo at billing@acme.com within 24 hours.
